config.csearcher.title: ContainerSearcher Config
config.csearcher.option.distanceMode: Distance mode (only show containers within x chunks around you)
config.csearcher.option.showDirectionLin: Show direction particles line to target
config.csearcher.option.autoOpenIfNear: Auto open target container if near you
config.csearcher.option.focusedSlotMatch: Focused slot matching strict mode (also match enchants, content, damage, etc...)
config.csearcher.option.searchNearDistan: Search hovered Item in near Chests max distance
config.csearcher.option.searchNearForHel: Search near key also works for held item
config.csearcher.option.deleteCacheOnDel: Delete cache when deleting a world
config.csearcher.option.searchNearIgnore: Search in near containers ignores full containers
config.csearcher.option.minBlinkAmount: Minimum amount of blinks for outline
config.csearcher.option.automation.sendO: Send command/chat message on item click while holding CTRL
Send anyway if near a container
config.csearcher.option.sensitive: Click to show sensitive settings (hidden for your safety)
config.csearcher.option.sensitive.blackl: servers should be prefixed with "MP_" like `MP_server_address.net`
